jobDescription: The Customer Data and Analytics (CDnA) team provides strategic, data, operational, reporting and analytics services for the Devices marketing teams at Microsoft. Come join us to support the core operational reporting infrastructure as a Data Analyst.  This role is critical to the success of delivering regularly scheduled reports, tools, and analysis to marketers within Xbox, Surface, and other Microsoft devices. This role will partner closely with team peers on the development, validation, deployment and on-going operations of new reports and toolsets that provide vital key performance indicators on measuring the impact of our marketing efforts. This role will be hands-on, querying internal data sources to analyze behavior data and provide insights on customer engagement, preferences, and monetization.
